alert.note: Alert for Cass; Jackson; Johnson; Lafayette (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 1:33AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Cass, southwestern Lafayette, southern Jackson and northwestern Johnson Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 133 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lee`s Summit, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Raytown, Grandview, Belton, Raymore, Grain Valley, Pleasant Hill, Greenwood, Lake Lotawana, Lake Winnebago, Lone Jack, Lake Tapawingo, Baldwin Park, Bates City, Strasburg, Unity Village and Tarsney Lakes. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 10 and 32. Interstate 470 between mile markers 1 and 16. Interstate 435 between mile markers 67 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
